title: Core Facility Management: Crucial Skills & Strategies
content: Since the inception of the Micro/Nano Technology Center (MNTC), the core facility has undergone growth with respect to clients, capabilities, and revenue. In 2007, the MNTC opened as a 10,000 ft2 $30M cleanroom closely aligned with the Speed School of Engineering. In 2014, the MNTC implemented facility management software to control tool access, scheduling, training and tool interlocks to accurately record instrument usage for invoicing.
